CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Date_of_Birth__c), 'ESTIMATED: ' & TEXT(Estimated_Age__c) & ' YEARS' , TEXT(FLOOR((TODAY()-Date_of_Birth__c +1)/365.2425)) &' YEARS' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((TODAY() - Date_of_Birth__c),365)/30)) &' MONTHS' & ' ' & TEXT(MOD(MOD((TODAY() - Date_of_Birth__c),365),30)) &' DAYS')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated as the amount of time between today and the birthdate of the animal. If no birthdate is entered, then estimated date it used.
CustomField.label: Calculated Age
